Title: Half Empty
Writer: Andrew Finnigan, Aaron Fullerton (screenplay), David Harlos
Actors: David Harlos, Andrew Finnigan, Darlene Sellers, Victoria Drake
Plot: When Wes' marriage dissolves, he moves in with his best friend since childhood, Ray, but a sudden aneurysm puts Ray in a coma for weeks. Wes, despite himself, finds a sense of peace in the ...
